articles.author: Aaron Brown
articles.title: Google Chrome beats WhatsApp with an upgrade we all need right now - Express
articles.description: GOOGLE's all-conquering Chrome is the most popular desktop browser on the planet. And now the search engine giant wants to offer the millions of people using the software a quick one-tap way to launch a video call with their WhatsApp rival. Here's how.
